Self.Wiki: Determines the HUD display parameters above an enemy when targeted in-game.

nameTextID.Wiki:
Base FMG Entry ID.
+0 FE Aircraft Name
+1 FE Pilot Name
+2 Menu Aircraft Name
+3 Menu Pilot Name / Conversation Speaker Name
+4 Aircraft Name / Pilot Name

emblemImageID.Wiki: ID of the Menu Decal to use, refers to SB_DecalThumbnails.layout
